report.title: reportCheckouts
report.sql: select biblio_copy.barcode_nmbr ,biblio.title ,biblio.author ,biblio_copy.status_begin_dt ,biblio_copy.due_back_dt ,member.barcode_nmbr ,member.last_name ,member.first_name from biblio, biblio_copy, member where biblio.bibid = biblio_copy.bibid and biblio_copy.mbrid = member.mbrid and biblio_copy.status_cd = 'out'
